rev.model.settlement.core
Interface SettlementManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseSettlementManager
public interface SettlementManager

Manages external manipulation of settlements in the model.

Author:
maxwelldickey

Method Detail

getSettlements

java.util.List<Settlement> getSettlements()
Returns the set of settlements.

Returns:
the set of settlements.

placeSettlement

void placeSettlement(Settlement settlement)
                     throws TileOccupiedException
Places a settlement at the specified tile.

Parameters:
population - the initial population of the settlement.
settlement - the settlement.
Throws:
TileOccupiedException - called when trying to place a settlement on a tile that already contains one.

placePaidSettlement

void placePaidSettlement(Settlement newSettlement,
                         Settlement payer)
Places a settlement at the specified tile, paid for by another settlement.

Parameters:
newSettlement - the new settlement.
payer - the payer for the settlement.

getSettlement

Settlement getSettlement(java.lang.Integer x,
                         java.lang.Integer y)
Returns the settlement at the specified tile.

Parameters:
x - the x index of the tile.
y - the y index of the tile.
Returns:
the settlement at the tile, if one exists.

hasSettlement

java.lang.Boolean hasSettlement(java.lang.Integer x,
                                java.lang.Integer y)
Returns whether a settlement exists at the specified tile.

Parameters:
x - the x index of the tile.
y - the y index of the tile.
Returns:
true if a settlement exists at the tile, false otherwise.

removeSettlement

java.lang.Boolean removeSettlement(java.lang.Integer x,
                                   java.lang.Integer y)
Removes the settlement at the specified tile. Cannot remove a settlement that is populated.

Parameters:
x - the x index of the tile.
y - the y index of the tile.
Returns:
true if the settlement was removed, false otherwise.

transferGrain

                                Settlement receiver,
                                int quantity)
Transfers a quantity of grain between settlements, and applies a transfer free to the sending settlement.

Parameters:
sender - the sender.
receiver - the receiver.
quantity - the transfer quantity.
Returns:

sender - the sender.
receiver - the receiver.
